name: Fanfare Fantasy
description:
You got thrown out of the Music Club for not being funky enough. Gather a crew of musicians around the town and show them who's boss in this fanfare management/rhythm game.

Recruit various musicians for your fanfare by impressing them with your conducting skills in a fun rhythm game !

A Ludum Dare 45 game.

Features :

- A dynamic soundtrack that evolves with your fanfare
- Many sprites
- Randomly generated musicians
- One epic boss fight
- 3 levels of difficulty, from Beginner to Pro
- Incredible 320p cut scenes
- A metric ton of spaghetti code

Credits :

- Music : Reblys (https://twitter.com/BS_Reblys)
- Art & design  : Goomboo (https://twitter.com/MapleGecko)
- Code & design : Valden (https://twitter.com/valdenthoranar)

Tools used :
- Gamemaker Studio 2
- FL Studio 20
- Aseprite
